option.od: print the help message and exit.
verbose. Log information to the console.
filename of the iqdat format file. If this is omitted the file is read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Creates an index of a iqdat format file.

description.p: Creates an index of a iqdat format file.
The index is written to standard output.

example.description: Create an index file for the iqdat format file "20040830.gbr.iqdat". The index is writen to the file "20040830.gbr.iqinx".
